author: Press
title: Pure Gold Jewellers to offer largest collection of GIA graded loose diamonds
text:
(MENAFN Press) Award winning jewellery retailer and the only World Diamond Mark certified retailer in the GCC, Pure Gold Jewellers has expanded its offerings with the largest selection of GIA graded loose diamonds in the region. Customers wishing to buy a GIA graded diamond can now browse the selection on Pure Gold Jewellers online portal and book it through any of their retail stores. It will then be delivered to their door step in just 3-4 working days accompanied by a GIA grading report detailing its quality.

Established in 1931, GIA is the world's foremost authority on diamonds, coloured stones and pearls. In the 1940s, GIA established the 4Cs (colour, clarity, cut and carat weight) and the International Diamond Grading System„ “ to this day, the worldwide standard for evaluating diamond quality. GIA reports are also highly secure, with microprint lines, holograms and security screens to make sure it is authentic, giving customers peace of mind.

Karim Merchant, CEO & MD of Pure Gold Jewellers, says: "GIA graded diamonds are the most meticulously evaluated gems in the world and we are proud to offer a selection of over 15,000 stones for our customers to choose from. These are available in different cuts including solitaire, princess, round or oval. The loose diamonds can be used to make customized pieces of jewellery or simply as an investment."

The diamonds are carefully selected and analysed by Pure Gold Jewellers from international suppliers. These select stones have been cut with excellent precision and come from "conflict free" areas of the world and meet Pure Gold Jewellers' strict quality standards for outstanding cut, color and clarity. 

About Pure Gold Jewellers 
Pure Gold Jewellers is an award winning jewellery retailer recognized for excellent customer service. It is now one of the fastest growing jewellery brands with 125 stores in 11 countries. It is the only 'D' certified World Diamond Mark authorized diamond retailer in the GCC region.Pure Gold Jewellers is a recipient of the "Best Service Performance Brand" award in the large business category for five years - 2007-2008, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2011-2012, 2012-2013 and 2014-2015 - under the Dubai Service Excellence Scheme (DSES) of the Dubai Department of Economic Development.The company also topped in the 'Best Customer Service' category in the UAE jewellery sector in an annual study by international consultancy Ethos Consultancy for the year 2009 and 2010.Pure Gold Jewellers has been consistently ranked as a Superbrand by UAE Superbrand Council for six consecutive years since 2009.For further information please visit www.pugold.com
